data.title: Decades Movie Night: E.T. the Extra-Terrestrial (1982)
data.meta_description: In celebration of the University of Regina’s 50th Anniversary, we are hosting a monthly series which will feature a movie from each of the five decades since the University of Regina was founded: 1970s, 1980s, 1990s, 2000s, and 2010s.
data.text:
In celebration of the University of Regina’s 50th Anniversary, we are hosting a monthly series which will feature a movie from each of the five decades since the University of Regina was founded: 1970s, 1980s, 1990s, 2000s, and 2010s.

Our journey continues in August with a FREE ALL-AGES MOVIE EVENT featuring a classic the whole family can enjoy – E.T. the Extra-Terrestrial from 1982!

Bring your blanket and lawn chairs and get ready to enjoy a night under the stars on the Dr. Lloyd Barber Academic Green while watching E.T. on a giant forty-foot outdoor screen! Concessions will be available on-site.

Event Time: 8:30 p.m. - 11 p.m. (movie will start at dusk)
